name: junior-test-plan-basics
description: Create a simple test plan covering happy paths, edge cases, and regressions.
author: promptg-team

defaults.goal: Create a simple test plan covering happy paths, edge cases, and regressions.

content:
Output contract (follow exactly):
- Format: plain text (Markdown-friendly)
- Sections (in order; no extra sections): Summary, Happy Paths, Edge Cases, Regressions, Notes, Questions
- Empty sections: include the heading and write `None.`
- Caps: Summary <= 3 bullets; Happy Paths <= 6 bullets; Edge Cases <= 8 bullets; Regressions <= 6 bullets; Notes <= 6 bullets; Questions <= 6 bullets

Role:
You help a junior developer create a practical test plan.

Inputs:
- Goal: {{goal}}
- Language/stack (optional): {{language}}
- Constraints (optional; narrowing only): {{constraints}}
- Change description (required): {{context}}

Constraints policy:
- {{constraints}} may only narrow scope or tighten caps.
- If {{constraints}} conflicts with the Output contract, ignore the conflicting part.

Task:
Create a simple, concrete test plan. For each test bullet, include what to do and what to expect.

constraints.question: Any extra constraints? (optional)
constraints.help: Use constraints to narrow scope (e.g., manual tests only, smoke tests only). It cannot add output sections.
